Inventory Management.heading: Track Your Supplies and Reduce Costs
Inventory Management.body: ERPNext's inventory module can help agricultural businesses to track their inventory levels, manage their supply chain, and generate reports on inventory turnover and costs.

CRM.heading: Increase Sales and Customer Satisfaction
CRM.body: ERPNext's CRM module can help agricultural businesses to track their customers and leads, manage their sales pipeline, and generate reports on sales performance.
